‚ùì FAQs

Does the extension collect my data?

This extension does not collect data unless explicitly required and with user permission.

Who made this extension?

This extension is powered by the NFSFU234FormValidation Library, created by NFORSHIFU234 Dev || Shifu-Nfor Nyuiring-yoh.

How can I provide feedback or report issues?

You can provide feedback or report issues through social icons and a feedback button on the extension popup. Additionally, you can also provide feedback or report issues on our GitHub organization account or repository.

What is this extension about?

This extension is a form validation library designed for developers to test and preview NFSFU234FormValidation Library functionalities before implementation. It provides developers with a convenient way to assess the validation process without integrating it directly into their codebase.

Can the extension work on all websites?

The extension is designed to work on most websites. However, compatibility may vary depending on the website's existing validation methods and scripts. It is recommended for developers to use the extension as a preview tool and to test its functionality on their specific websites.

Additionally, users can implement the library in their applications by including it via CDN. To do so, you can visit the GitHub repository of the library for specific guide.

Are validation rules and themes customizable?

Validation rules and themes are currently in development and will be available soon. For now, the extension utilizes default validation settings.
